interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Portable Electric Nail Drill,Professional Nail Drill Kit for Acrylic Gel Nails,Efile Nail Drill Manicure Polishing Shape Tools for Beginners Home Salon Use,Purple
Review Date: 2020/12/27
Store: Romanda
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Romanda', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.17 x 3.15 x 1.77 inches', 'Item Weight': '310 Grams', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Product Dimensions': '7.17 x 3.15 x 1.77 inches; 10.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'C99', 'Manufacturer': 'Romanda'}
Review Text: Honestly, an e-file is not something I really need to use for my own nails, but it is something my mom constantly talks about getting to use to remove when she occasionally gets gel or dip or some other kind of manicure which she doesn't have the patience to remove without severely damaging her nails, even when I try to help... So I got this to use on her, and I'm very happy with it! It feels solid, and is comfortable to use even for long periods of time. I used it to remove my mom's dip nails yesterday, and she said that it vibrated and bothered her less than her nail tech's drill does. It also did a really good job removing the dip powder; you can control how much it removes by changing the speed and direction of the drill, or the amount of pressure you apply. For different tasks, it also comes with different drill bits. Plus, you get a nice feeling storage bag, and a brush to brush off the mess you make filing. And, I love the purple color! This drill is definitely a win, especially for the price point. Definitely recommend!
Review Title: Solid e-file with everything you need!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 PalNour {} When I pulled the first of these masks out of the package, I didn't think that it would fit on my face at all. Mainly, because the eye holes were only about a centimeter wide, and the mouth hole was literally just a slit in the plastic. However, once I pulled off the plastic sheet that helps the mask keep its shape in the package, I found that these holes stretched, so it ended up working out okay, though I would still like for the eye holes to be a little bit longer as they barely fit around my eyes. Overall, because of the material / stretchiness of the mask, this fit my face better than a lot of other sheet masks do.
The main reason I'm giving only three stars is the feel of the mask itself. When I first touched it, my immediate thought was that it felt like a donut that sat in a pool of water for several hours and ended up being soggier than anyone should have to even imagine (trust me, I worked at a donut shop for years and this accidentally happened sometimes). My husband's reaction was that it felt like boogers. After taking it off and inspecting it a little more closely, we both thought it pretty much looked and felt like soggy toilet paper. Whichever answer you got with, it's not at all pleasant to touch, and not a pleasant texture moving around on your face either. Once you get it on, as long as you basically hold still and don't talk or anything, then it actually has a nice cooling, refreshing feeling. And it smells wonderfully like cucumber, which is what I was really hoping for!
The other reason I'm giving three stars is because it left my face feeling sticky for a long time after I removed the mask. Some masks leave a sticky feeling for a few minutes, but this one took almost two hours to absorb into my skin because it left so much. With other masks I don't normally help this along, so I didn't with this one either. When it finally did absorb, I was happy with how my face felt... I'm not against getting this mask again especially for the price because I did really like the cooling sensation in particular, it's just not one I'd get / use too often because of the gross, soggy feeling of the mask itself. Refreshing cucumber face mask, unpleasant texture Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure pine {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'} The black in this set is not even close to the best - it 100% requires two coats, and even then still isn't the best (pictured is two coats). But, I'm here for the shimmers, and I'm not disappointed! The tops of the bottles are labeled with a colored sticker for convenience, and the shimmers only require one coat over the black. It's hard to capture the color shifting on camera, but it's absolutely stunning! I couldn't recommend it more. It looks different at different angles, and over different colors. All polishes in this set cured in 60 seconds for me; they are pictured without a top coat since this set didn't provide one. Chameleon shimmers! Pine Gel Nail Polish Set 6 Colors Purple Blue Cat Eye Glitter Gel Polish 7.5 ml Soak Off UV LED Cure Home Salon Manicure pine {'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '9.524 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '4.84 x 2.87 x 3.58 inches; 9.77 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890955'} With the exception of the glitter in this set, they're pretty much one coaters! All cured in 60 seconds; the creme colors are nice, but I got this set for the magnetic ones and I'm not disappointed! Even without the magnetic effect, those two polishes are shimmery and beautiful. With the magnetic affect, they're very different, but still stunning. I actually feel that even with the magnetic affect, one coat was just fine. I added a second just to see what that looked like, and it made the edges darker, and the magnetic effect less profound, in my opinion. Still, this set is absolutely worth it! The tops of the bottles are labeled with a colored sticker for convenience, which is great. Nearly one coaters Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} I'm really happy with these colors - most of my gels are just plain solid colors, so I definitely need more holo and glitters in general. All of these except for the silver are holo, so it's so hard to pick just one favorite, especially when the silver is a metallic foil!
All of the polishes are pictured in two coats just to show how that looks, but if you're going for full opacity you might want to do a third especially if you have long nails. Alternatively, you could wear them over a similar base color. They cured just fine under my lamp in 60 seconds; they are wipe colors though, so you either need to wipe them or put a top coat on. They're pictured without a top coat, because this kit didn't come with one. They're still wonderfully shiny without a top coat!
The bottles of this set come with numbered dots to label them, but not colored dots; however, it comes with a sheet of stickers that you can swatch them on your own. If you're like me and have other gels which also don't have colored dots, you might be happy to know this comes with a few extra stickers so you can do a couple of others too. Definitely recommend! 5 holo colors and 1 foil color! Portable Electric Nail Drill,Professional Nail Drill Kit for Acrylic Gel Nails,Efile Nail Drill Manicure Polishing Shape Tools for Beginners Home Salon Use,Purple Romanda {'Brand': 'Romanda', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '7.17 x 3.15 x 1.77 inches', 'Item Weight': '310 Grams', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Product Dimensions': '7.17 x 3.15 x 1.77 inches; 10.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'C99', 'Manufacturer': 'Romanda'} Honestly, an e-file is not something I really need to use for my own nails, but it is something my mom constantly talks about getting to use to remove when she occasionally gets gel or dip or some other kind of manicure which she doesn't have the patience to remove without severely damaging her nails, even when I try to help... It also did a really good job removing the dip powder; you can control how much it removes by changing the speed and direction of the drill, or the amount of pressure you apply. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus**: Strong interest in facial skincare; actively seeks hydrating and revitalizing products, evaluating them based on effectiveness and tactile experience.
- **Texture Sensitivity**: Values product texture, has a negative reaction to unpleasant or soggy textures, and prefers comfortable formulas.
- **Performance Evaluation**: Rates products based on effectiveness and sensory experience, willing to tolerate minor inconveniences for satisfactory results.
- **Fragrance Preference**: Enjoys refreshing scents, particularly fruity or natural fragrances.
- **Occasional Use**: Prefers using products occasionally rather than daily staples; values affordability and lasting results.
- **Review Approach**: Provides detailed personal feedback highlighting pros (such as stunning visual effects) and cons (like coverage issues).
- **Nail Care Interest**: Strong enthusiasm for gel nail polishes, with a focus on unique finishes like shimmers, holographics, and metallics that enhance aesthetic appeal and allow for creative expression. Recently expressed a growing preference for glitter and holo colors and has shown an interest in nail care tools for enhancing application techniques.
- **New Equipment Acquisition**: Recently purchased a portable electric nail drill primarily for the convenience of assisting others with nail care, highlighting its comfort, effectiveness, and ease of use. This reflects a practical approach towards nail maintenance, further emphasizing the user’s dedication to achieving professional results at home while enjoying the visual aesthetics of their nail designs. 

The user demonstrates a thoughtful consideration of both skincare and nail products, balancing functionality with personal comfort and a keen eye for visual results.
